statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions;
SELECT discussion_id, topic FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT topic, created_at FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE participant_name = 'Bob';
SELECT discussion_id, message FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE topic = 'Math' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT participant_name, message FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic, participant_name FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE participant_name = 'Alice'
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_created_at, COUNT(*) AS total_discussions FROM virtual_classroom_discussions
SELECT topic, COUNT(*) AS discussion_count FROM virtual_classroom_discussions GROUP BY topic ORDER BY discussion_count DESC
SELECT topic, created_at FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE topic LIKE '%math%'
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions ORDER BY topic ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT discussion_id, speaker, duration_minutes FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT topic, speaker, timestamp FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions WHERE speaker = 'John Doe';
SELECT speaker, COUNT(*) AS total_discussions FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions GROUP BY speaker ORDER BY total_discussions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Classroom_Interactions WHERE participant LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions;
SELECT discussion_id, topic, speaker FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions ORDER BY topic DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_discussions FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions;
SELECT * FROM Virtual_Classroom_Interactions WHERE participant='Alice' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT discussion_id, speaker, duration_minutes FROM Virtual_Classroom_Discussions WHERE topic LIKE '%math%' ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions;
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_date FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE discussion_id = 1;
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_participants FROM virtual_classroom_discussions ORDER BY discussion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description, interaction_date FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE discussion_date >= '2021-05-01';
SELECT discussion_topic FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE LENGTH(discussion_topic) > 20;
SELECT discussion_id, discussion_topic, JSON_LENGTH(discussion_participants) AS participant_count FROM virtual_classroom_discussions ORDER BY participant_count DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, student_id, interaction_description FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-07-15' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM moderator_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%warning%' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms;
SELECT id, topic, start_time FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE participants IS NULL;
SELECT id, discussion_topic, discussion_content FROM discussions ORDER BY discussion_time DESC;
SELECT id, participant_name, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE last_interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT topic, participants, start_time FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT discussion_topic, discussion_content, discussion_time FROM discussions WHERE discussion_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT participant_name, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE room_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attending_since, last_interaction_time FROM attendees WHERE last_interaction_time IS NOT NULL AND room_id = 1 ORDER BY attending_since ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions;
SELECT topic, timestamp FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT count(*) FROM user_attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT user_id, action FROM interaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT discussion_id, user_id, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE question = 'How satisfied are you with the session?' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE topic = 'Introduction';
SELECT user_id, topic, timestamp FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT discussion_id, user_id, topic, message FROM virtual_classroom_discussions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM user_attendance WHERE date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT discussion_id, user_id, question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE answer LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY discussion_id ASC,user_id DESC;
